Package org.hibernate.boot.jaxb.internal

Class MappingBinder

java.lang.Object
org.hibernate.boot.jaxb.internal.AbstractBinder<JaxbBindableMappingDescriptor>
org.hibernate.boot.jaxb.internal.MappingBinder
All Implemented Interfaces:
Binder<JaxbBindableMappingDescriptor>
public class MappingBinder extends AbstractBinder<JaxbBindableMappingDescriptor>
Responsible for coordinating binding of mapping XML documents into JAXB representations, producing Binding references.
